channel.title: Gateway through another whonix gateway
channel.description:
Hi, how I can make a machine whonix gateway pass through another whonix gateway, to have more protection with the workstation.
It is safer than only a gateway?
I'm worried, because in my country TOR is punished for justice
Thank you for all.
Best regards, Mr.X

item.title: Gateway through another whonix gateway
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
[quote author=MrX link=topic=478.msg3715#msg3715 date=1409516135]
but about my question for connect 2 getaway, one through the other gateway, whats is your opinion?, it’s best for more security?
[/quote[
My links to https://www.whonix.org/wiki/DoNot#Prevent_Tor_over_Tor_scenarios. can be summarized as: discouraged.

MrX:

I don’t use a tor browser in a workstation, because I need use a vpn in workstation for the websites can detected if I use tor and they block the access… for this reason I asked

Seems unrelated.

Read full topic

item.title: Gateway through another whonix gateway
item.dc:creator: MrX
item.description:
Thanks Patrick, I will read all, but about my question for connect 2 getaway, one through the other gateway, whats is your opinion?, it’s best for more security? I don’t use a tor browser in a workstation, because I need use a vpn in workstation for the websites can detected if I use tor and they block the access… for this reason I asked

Thanks to all whonix team

Read full topic

item.title: Gateway through another whonix gateway
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This is undocumented and recommended against:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/DoNot#Prevent_Tor_over_Tor_scenarios.

You may also be interested:

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Hide_Tor_and_Whonix_from_your_ISP
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Bridges

Read full topic
